title: Introducing ChatGPT Enterprise
summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Enterprise, a version of its language model designed for businesses. The enterprise-grade solution offers enhanced security and privacy features, unlimited access to GPT-4, longer context windows for processing longer inputs, advanced data analysis capabilities, customization options, and more. ChatGPT Enterprise has already been adopted by industry leaders such as Block, Canva, Carlyle, The Estée Lauder Companies, PwC, and Zapier. OpenAI plans to introduce additional features in the future, including customization options and solutions tailored to specific roles within organizations.
